verses.roman:
tabe vipra prabhure lañā āilā nija-ghare
āpana-icchāya prabhura nānā sevā kare

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; vipra—the brāhmaṇa; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; āilā—came back; nija-ghare—to his home; āpana-icchāya—by his own will; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nānā—various; sevā—services; kare—rendered.
translation: The brāhmaṇa then took Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to his home and, out of his own free will, began to serve the Lord in various ways.
